name: Do Feed The Bears (Del / birdpun)
description:
Have you ever found yourself looking to feel relaxed as you fed a bear in the woods? 

Well look no further!

Explore, gather, and cook delicious meals for your companion in this easy-to-grasp experience.

Created By:

William Lu, Del Nordlund, Gareth Hudson

                                

Controls:

Movement = W, A, S, D

Interact = Spacebar 

Footnotes:

Unfortunately, there are no updates planned for this prototype at present.
